name: Ant Muncher
description: Ant Muncher takes you through the life and struggles of a regular worker ant.  In order to survive and make top marks, you must create the shortest path to the queen ant by tunneling through the dirt.  However, there’s a catch. An ant can only travel so far before needing food to replenish its energy. This means that you must figure out the most efficient path to get to the queen ant without running your ant to starvation.  Ant Muncher is all about finding the balance between reaching the end quickly and having enough stamina to make it there.
